level.text: A petition under this subchapter may be filed only in a court that has jurisdiction to make a child-custody determination with respect to the child at issue under §§ 16-4601.01 to 16-4604.02.
A court of this state has temporary emergency jurisdiction under § 16- 4602.04 if the court finds a credible risk of abduction.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Child Abduction Prevention Act. See Vol. 9, Pt. 1A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
